Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.
Generation IX.Violet: Ice energy builds up in the horn on its upper jaw, causing the horn to reach cryogenic temperatures that freeze its surroundings.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: North Province: Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
